title: French from France: to swim like a fish = Nager comme un poisson
creator_credit: Michael Style, Donald Carter, Associated Television and Schools Broadcast
brief_description: French language training film. Teaches French conversation, at the beach. Two girls sunbathe, swim, meet their friends and play a ball game. Their lively chatter using a wide vocabulary entertains and helps students with pronunciation in a natural way. Script by Jean Pierre Angremy, starring Claude Carroll as Marianne and Francois Apestoguy as Monique and members of the Comedie De L’Quest, Centre Dramatique National.
